content.title: Granulomatosis with Polyangiitis (GPA)
content.description: Formerly Wegener's granulomatosis - necrotizing granulomatous vasculitis

key_concepts.details: Upper respiratory, lung, and kidney involvement
PR3-ANCA (c-ANCA) positive in 80-90% of active generalized disease
Small vessel vasculitis; rarely medium vessel with aneurysms
Remission induction: rituximab or cyclophosphamide + glucocorticoids

content.clinical_significance: Most common ANCA vasculitis; important systemic diagnosis
content.statement: Granulomatosis with Polyangiitis (GPA) is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Vasculitis that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
